Name: Curry Powder
Description: The integral mix of herbs and seasonings for dishes all across the world.

DescriptionLocalization.es: La combinación integral de hierbas y condimentos para platos en todo el mundo.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 전 세계의 요리에 필요한 허브와 양념을 섞은 것.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Der Mix aus Kräutern und Gewürzen für Gerichte aus der ganzen Welt.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 世界中の料理に欠かせない、香辛料を組み合わせた調味料。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: A mistura integral de ervas e temperos para pratos de todo o mundo.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 世界各地的菜与这个调味料的有机混合。
